ComicInfo.Summary:
HE'S THE MERC WITH THE MOUTH! (FULL OF BIRTHDAY CAKE!)
Deadpool's turning 30! And to help celebrate, we've assembled some of his classic storytellers to tell tales of Wade Wilson birthdays past, present and future! A first birthday with time-traveling assassins! A sweet sixteen party that would make Molly Ringwald weep! A 100th birthday that could only be celebrated in grand Deadpool style! Blow out the candles! Pin the cybernetic arm on the Cable! And open this present, just for you!
*Story Titles* The Immaculate Misconception Baby's First Cable Best There Is Lo, There Shall Come A Hero! Maybe... Short Story, Tall Tale No Chill Whatsoever Party For One The Tao of 'Pool *List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------|-----------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Ed McGuinness & Chris Sotomayor | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Mike Hawthorne & Nathan Fairbairn | 2 | | Var | Variant Cover | Rob Liefeld & Jay David Ramos | 3 |
ComicInfo.Writer: Brian Posehn,Chad Bowers,Daniel Way,Fabian Nicieza,Gail Simone,Gerry Duggan,Joe Kelly,Kelly Thompson,Skottie Young
